name: 郭政淳
objective:
本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics: phonetics & phonology, syntax, semantics, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on language learning (native or foreign), teaching or other language-related study.
schedule:
Week 1  Holiday-No Class 
Week 2  Introduction
Week 3  Phonetics (I)
Week 4  Phonetics (II)
Week 5  Phonology (I)
Week 6  Phonology (II)
Week 7  Review 
Week 8  Midterm Exam (I)
Week 9  Morphology (I)
Week 10  Morphology (II) 
Week 11 Syntax (I)
Week 12 Syntax (II)
Week 13 Midterm Exam (II)
Week 14 Semantics (I)
Week 15 Semantics (II)
Week 16 Pragmatics (I)
Week 17 Pragmatics (II)
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework 20% 
Class Activity 20%
Group Report 10%
Midterm Exams 30%
Final Exam 20%
materials: Language Files. Department of Linguistics, The Ohio State University Press. (12th edition)
